Reviews.Title: View is not as described
Reviews.Author: Bill_OKC
Reviews.Content: After calculating view from aperture, focal length, and such, the realized view was not as described.  Clarity was no better than my 420 tv line cameras.

Reviews.Title: Good low budget camera with higher end features
Reviews.Author: scrapant
Reviews.Content: Nice camera for the price. 196' ir distance, 9-22 mm varifocal lens, 700 tvl high resolution all for $75.00.It definitely has some higher end features. Also compatible with my high resolution 960h dvr. If your looking for a good cheap camera, you might consider purchasing this one.

Reviews.Title: Excellent value for high quality
Reviews.Author: JGM
Reviews.Content: Last week I received one of these cameras. The zoom and focus are incredible.  The clarity is far better than my Q-See 540 TVL camera. In fact, the Q-See is bush league compared to this GW. I was so impressed that i ordered two more cameras. This is an excellent value for the money.I gave it 4 stars because there was not a good owners manual.Their shipping was fast. It was shipped the day it was ordered.Calling the company directly was terrific. I was speaking to a person within a few seconds. There was no listening to music for an hour.

ProductInfo.Features:
2011 New arrival IR CCTV Camera; 1/3-Inch SONY EXview HAD CCD II
Enhanced Features and Fine Image Processor
OSD/NR/BLC; Zoom & focus outside adjusting ; Suitable for wall & celling installing
ProductInfo.Name: GW Security Professional CCTV 700TVL 1/3-Inch Sony Exview HAD CCD II, 9-22mm Varifocal Lens, 72pcs IR LED Outdoor Security Camera
